nodes.text: The Vex crusade was an alleged organization led by an alien named Sandewar Mandewar. When the notorious doctor and smuggler Cornelius Evazan pretended to demonstrate his shape-shifting abilities to the rogue archaeologist Chelli Aphra while disguised under the alias "Lopset Yas" sometime between 0 ABY and 3 ABY, he changed into his depiction of Mandewar. Evazan further mentioned that the supposed alien held the position as leader of the Vex crusade.

The Vex crusade was mentioned in the comic Doctor Aphra 21, written by Si Spurrier and published by Marvel Comics on June 27, 2018. Due to the capitalization of speech in the comic, it is not known whether "crusade" is capitalized or not.
